questions.text: While Will, Zoey, and Charlie were in the same room together, which two Presidents did Zoey say died on the same Fourth of July?
questions.explanation:
Adams and Jefferson.

	Zoey told Will that her dad like the Fourth of July and the fact that when John Adams was dying, he was glad that Jefferson lived. John Adams didn't know that Thomas Jefferson had died earlier in the day.

questions.text: According to Amy, who had a job as a motivational speaker?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh was answering Amy's questions in one-word answers and then wasn't giving her very much information considering she was the first lady's chief-of-staff and handling things the first lady should have been doing.

questions.text: Toby told CJ that Molly already hated her dad.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Toby was showing CJ pictures of the twins at Huck's bris and after showing CJ one of the pictures he told CJ that Huck was already hated him.

questions.text: Where did Leo have the swearing-in ceremony for the new American citizens?
options: On the steps of the Capitol
questions.explanation:
In the White House.

	When the President called it a day, Leo told him he had one more thing he had to do and took him to a White House auditorium to see the swearing in of the new American citizens.

questions.text: According to Josh, why was the Republican leadership meeting moved to another time?
questions.correct: So Haffley could watch the race at Daytona
options: Because Haffley's son had a tee ball game
Haffley was scared of Josh and Leo
questions.explanation:
So Haffley could watch the race at Daytona.

	Josh told Donna that they rescheduled the meeting so Haffley could watch the green flag at Daytona, but Donna corrected him and said that Haffley's son had a tee ball game.

questions.text: When the episode began, who were Josh and Leo talking to about being the new Vice President?
options: Josh was talking to Leo about being the new Vice President
questions.explanation:
Secretary of State Berryhill.

	Leo scheduled Secretary of State Berryhill the night before so they could talk about him being the new Vice President. Secretary of State Berryhill said he was ready for the job.

questions.text: Where were Amy and Josh when they kissed?
options: On the patio during the fireworks
questions.explanation:
In his office.

	Amy had stopped by Josh's office and was talking non-stop. When Josh finally got her to stop talking, Amy took her shoes off and laid her feet against his desk. Josh stopped what he was doing, walked over to her, and kissed her.

questions.text: Which one of the President's staff did he ask if they wanted to be the Vice President?
questions.explanation:
Charlie.

	The President was frustrated over the people he was meeting to tell them about the short list with their names on it. When Charlie entered to tell the President about Zoey's meeting with Will, the President asked Charlie if he wanted the Vice Presidency. When Charlie said no, the President told him he could stay.

questions.text: Which member of the Republican Leadership's VP list did Toby say he loved?
questions.explanation:
Frost.

	While everyone was in the Oval Office talking about the people on the list that the Republican leadership gave to Leo and Josh, Toby said he loved Diane Frost and would marry her is she were into men.

questions.text: Who became the new Vice President?
questions.explanation:
Russell.

	The President chose Bob Russell even though no one liked him and Leo told Will and Toby as they watched the Fourth of July fireworks from the White House balcony.
